title.en: Levelling Up In An Exclusive Dungeon

description.en:
Kang Jin-hyeok, a D-rank hunter for years. His days were spent barely scraping by with part-time jobs, unable to level up due to the hunting grounds being controlled by major guilds.
One day, a dungeon appears in his room.

“This is… a dungeon?”

With the dungeon now in his possession, Jinhyuk begins to successfully hunt, level up, and gradually grow stronger…

“Just wait and see, you major guild scumbags who looked down on me!
I will become strong, with this dungeon!”

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, "Give me your life."

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

altTitles.ja: 終末の花嫁様 -sweet home†melty life-

description.en:
Michiru, born under his extremely religious mother, believes that one day an angel would come down and save him from his suffering and pain. 

After getting severely bruised and beaten up from the kids at his school, his nextdoor neighbor, Hikari, comes to his aide and carries him to her home. While Michiru is asleep, she rampages the world, destroying everything. 

When he awakes, it is revealed to him that Hikari is an angel. Michiru asks Hikari to marry him, which she gladly accepts. 

Will their sudden post-apocalypse and newlywed life give Michiru what he always wanted? Or is there more to it under the surface?
description.id:
"Tolong... Menikahlah denganku!"

Michiru, seorang anak laki-laki yang tidak memiliki "tempat tinggal" baik di rumah maupun di sekolah.
Hikari, onee-san kikuk yang merupakan tetangga dari Michiru.
Sebuah proposal tiba-tiba dibuat.

Setitik cahaya yang muncul di tengah-tengah keseharian yang menyakitkan dan melelahkan.
Di tengah keseharian itu, dunia mengalami kehancuran.

Sebuah keseharian pasutri antara seorang bocah dan malaikat dimulai!

(Sumber sinopsis : Amazon)
description.ja:
「私と…結婚してください！」

家にも学校にも居場所がない少年・みちるは、近所に住むうっかりやのお姉さん・ひかりに突然プロポーズされる。苦しくて、退屈な毎日の中で唯一の光。そんなある日、世界が滅んでしまって――

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.id:
Kolaborasi yang luar biasa dari author "Noblesse" dan author "Girls the Wild's"! Kisah aksi fantasi mengenai Kaiden yang jiwanya masuk ke seekor kucing gendut dan Jiwoo yang suka menyembunyikan kekuatannya!

description.ja:
敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

description.ko:
<노블레스> 손제호 작가와 <소녀더와일즈> 제나 작가가 만났다!
고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우
러블리 2인조의 액션 판타지

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

---

description.th:
เรื่องใหม่ของนักเขียน Son Je-ho จาก <โนเบลส> และ Zhena จาก <วีน เหวี่ยง WILD มัธยมสาวพันธุ์ดุ>! แอ็กชันแฟนตาซีสุดน่ารัก เรื่องราวของ "ไคเดน" ผู้มีพลังพิเศษแต่แฝงตัวด้วยการสิงอยู่ในร่างแมว และ "จีอู" นักเรียนหนุ่มทาสแมวแสนธรรมดาที่แอบซ่อนพลังที่ไม่ธรรมดาเอาไว้

description.zh:
超强觉醒者意外变身胖橘，
没想到铲屎官也有超能力!

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

title.en: A Second Chance At Saving You

altTitles.fr: Pour te sauver de ta tragique destinée

description.en: Empress Niobe Roden, the precious Blue Rose of the Rustan Empire, is in love with another man--the one to save her from her tyrant husband. She patiently waits for her lover Eloi, but all that returns is the news that the Emperor has beheaded him. Hopeless in her own imprisonment, Niobe ends her life only to be returned to the past–exactly two years before her marriage with Valon. With the second chance at life, Niobe is determined to conceal and protect her true love.

altTitles.ja: 世紀末オタクのゾンビ日記

altTitles.en: Qianfu Bai Ri, Wo Qule Nudi

altTitles.zh: 潜伏百日，我娶了敌国女帝

altTitles.en: After numerous days, the Regnant Empress married me

description.en:
**-Official**
A madhouse was blown up, and Yun Zhonghe, the director of the madhouse, traveled through time and went to another world. 29 gifted mental patients' souls went into his mind, so he got 29 weird skills! He joined the secret service of an empire and went to a hostile state. Many years passed. If he doesn't regain his true identity soon, he's going to become the Enemy Empress's husband and have children!



**-Unofficial**
One day, a mental hospital exploded leading to the transmigration of the chief of the *asylum*. He woke up in a foreign world with 29 out-of-ordinary talents he inherited from 29 out-of-ordinary patients. Follow him on the journey of seducing an enemy Regant Empress. 3 years, and another 3 years, the Empress married me and we're about to have children... I might lose my original agenda(identity)...
description.zh: x疯人院爆炸，院长云中鹤穿越，29个天才精神病人进入大脑，使他拥有29个诡异天赋！ 加入大内密探卧底敌国，三年又三年，再不恢复身份，我都混成女帝老公，要跟女帝生孩子了！

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They’re dismayed to see he’s useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!

‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

altTitles.ja: 魔女は満月に咲く

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

description.en: Losing memories after a confession?! A crossdressing boy and the one he loves are cursed to never fall deep in love, and are forced to repeat their confession over and over. What is the antidote to love? Can there be miracles in true love?

altTitles.ja: ひびちかタイム

description.en:
Kit never forgot her first love, Edwin. One day, she realized that Edwin had been sending some kind of signal for help. So she turned back time to the day when he was still alive. Edwin had given up on his life and only waited for his death to come. But when Kit pleaded for his life, his frozen heart thawed a little.

“Let’s move forward, but this time we will escape death,” she said, “You are not alone. We will do this together.”

Their affections for each other grew more as they battled against death. However, there was a dark energy of an inevitable doom that hovered between them….

“Your presence. You being alive is all that matters to me,” she said.

The moment they meet each other over time, their love becomes a stronger reality.

title.en: The Ending, I Want to Change it

description.en: Byun Soo-ah, an impoverished novelist who only writes bad endings, is possessed by someone's curse as Choi Se-hwa, the villainess of 'End of Youth', which is currently being serialized. Can Su-ah survive and return to her original world in a novel full of traitors, sociopaths, double personalities, and psychopaths?

altTitles.ja: メタリアルストーリー

description.en: Metalia, a world where mechanical creatures called the gears stroll. It was the so-called "machine hunters (collectors)" who hunted those who ruled the earth with mighty power. A boy now descends in Melzam, the largest city in Metaria. His name is Nill. He, with the right arm of the machine, had a secret. This is a story that looks for your fate.

title.en: I Don't Want to Play Matchmaker!

altTitles.en: I Don't Want to Be a Magpie Bridge
I Don't Want to Be an Ojakgyo
I Don't Want to Be the Magpie Bridge

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but… why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

“Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?”

“Whoa… It’d be amazing if that happens.”

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, “Should I run away with her…”

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

What’s up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

description.en:
"You’re its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

title.en: I Just Want to Mooch off Your Luck

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Jiù Xiǎng Cèng Nǐ De Qì Yùn

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Freeload on Your Luck

description.en: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"
description.zh: 重生后的赵明溪为了避开绝症活下去，不得不去蹭傅氏太子爷身上的气运。 这位太子爷每次看到她，明明耳朵快红得滴血，还要装出酷炫狂霸拽的样子：“你能不能别缠我？” 第二天赵明溪就真的去找别人蹭气运了。:) 小狼狗头低了下来，委委屈屈：“给你缠还不行吗？”

altTitles.ja: ハレンチゴルファー十べえ
ピンクのグリーン

description.en:
Many years have passed since the Great Shameless War. Somehow, to our delight, Shameless School is back in the 21st century! This time the Shameless School is learning the ways of golf. And so begins golf games where no shame is found. In the games, many nostalgic faces participate from works such as Abashiri Family, Kekkou Kamen, and even Devilman. Who gets the ball in the hole? Sure enough, Jubei is a strong hitter like always~ This is the Second Coming of the Shameless School that everyone has been waiting for~!

The volume also includes Pink's Green, 2 special golf-themed chapters originally released in 1985.

title.en: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.ja: 売れ残りの奴隷エルフを拾ったので、娘にすることにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Urenokori no Dorei Elf wo Hirotta no de, Musume ni suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.en: My Daughter Was an Unsold Enslaved Elf
My daughter was an unsold slave elf.

description.en:
Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct.

He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...? 

A warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elven daughter!
description.ja:
絶滅したというエルフの上位種、ハイエルフの少女が売られているのを見つけたヴァイス。

購入して娘として育てることに決めた。言葉も知らないハイエルフだったがヴァイスの懸命な育児の成果がでてきて…？ 

成長が止まらないハイエルフから目が離せないっっ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kino no Tabi - the Beautiful World

altTitles.ja: キノの旅 the Beautiful World

description.en: Destination is a state of mind. A tale of one girl and her bike and the road ahead. Kino wanders around the world on the back of Hermes, her unusual, anthropomorphic motorcycle, only staying in each country for three days. During their adventures, they find happiness, sadness, pain, decadence, violence, beauty, and wisdom. But through it all, they never lose their sense of freedom. They discover that because of the world's imperfections, it is actually a thing of beauty. "The world is not beautiful, therefore it is."

altTitles.ja: 魂の変則

description.en: Yuichi Shiro is a foolish, narcissistic, and oblivious teenage boy. After a sudden incident his once ordinary life goes through great changes. How will the optimistic self proclaimed genius handle the life he will lead from now on? As well as handle the new acquaintances and enemies it brings with it. Let the story of action, life, romance and stupidity begin. (Original Web [Novel](https://www.fictionpress.com/s/3068594/1/Soul-Anomaly)).

altTitles.ja: 灰仭巫覡

description.en: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!
description.ru: Ночь — феномен, некогда считавшийся природной катастрофой. Под угрозой уничтожения от не пойми чего, дети вознесли богам свои молитвы в форме танца, чтобы одолжить их силу, сдержать ярость Ночи и возродить мир из руин. По велению судьбы Дзин, парнишка из захолустного японского городка, встречает Гао, британского солдата, вынужденного покинуть свою страну из-за Ночи. Вдвоём они безмятежно проводили время вместе с друзьями в тихом городке в окружении природы. Пока однажды Ночь вновь не обрушилась на них!

altTitles.ja: 搾精病棟　全年齢版

altTitles.vi: Bị Vắt Kiệt Trong Phòng Bệnh

altTitles.zh-hk: 榨精病棟　全年齡版

description.en:
Yamada was hospitalized after breaking both hands, to make things worse, due to a unknown condition he has to ejaculate every three hours. The ward is full of evil nurses. Will Yamada be able to live and be discharged from the hospital?

TLDR: Guy has busted hands, gets sent to hospital for chronic ejaculation, guy gotta get his nuts busted by busty whacko nurses.
description.ja: 凶悪ナースらによる、最悪強制搾精！　奇病により３時間に一度射精をしなければいけなくなった主人公ヤマダ。両手骨折によって入院した先は、邪悪なナースの蠢く魑魅魍魎の病院だった！　次から次へと現れる問題児・恐怖政治・暴力・セックス。ヤマダは生きて退院の日を迎えられるのか平成が残した問題作、ネットを震撼させたあの『搾精病棟』がなぜかヤンマガで一般完全リメイク！　一般誌の限界を刮目せよ！

altTitles.ja: みにくい遊郭の子

altTitles.en: Ugly Duckling of the Entertainment District

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng xấu xí ở Phố Đèn Đỏ

altTitles.en: An Unsightly Girl of a Red Light District

description.en:
An abandoned high school girl becomes an Oiran in a strange world—

Esora, a high school girl who lost her place, found herself in an unknown red light district.
She was sold to a slave buyer at the Yukaku "Sagamiya".
The owner, Sagami, told her that Ishe could be the number one Oiran there.
description.ja:
居場所を失った女子高生エソラは、気がつくと知らない花街にいた。
人買いに売られやってきたのは、遊郭「相模屋」。
その主人である相模に、ここで1番の花魁になれると言われ―。
幻想的な世界観で描かれる異世界花魁物語。
description.vi:
Một nữ sinh trung học bị bỏ rơi trở thành Oiran (kỹ nữ cao cấp) ở một thế giới xa lạ—
Esora, một nữ sinh trung học bị mất chỗ ở, thấy mình đang ở một khu đèn đỏ vô danh. Cô bị bán cho một người mua nô lệ ở Phố đèn đỏ "Sagamiya". Người chủ, Sagami, nói với cô rằng nếu cô trở thành Oiran thì sẽ có thể làm lại cuộc đời.

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Pulitzer - Amuro Ray Beyond the Aurora

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム ピューリッツァー -アムロ・レイは極光の彼方へ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam Pulitzer: Amuro Ray wa Kyokkou no Kanata e

description.en: In UC0095, following the events of Char's Counterattack, Kikka Kobayashi gathers testimonies about Amuro Ray to show the world the kind of person he was.

title.en: I'm in Trouble With My Best Friend's Daughter

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin'yuu no Musume ni Semarare Komatte imasu

altTitles.ja: 親友の娘に迫られ困っています

description.en: Kiyoharu's predictable everyday life comes to an abrupt end when his best friend's daughter suddenly shows up, declares that she'll be living with him, and demands he makes her his wife.
The heartwarming story of two different girls brought together over a cat, as they learn about each other, spend time together, and heal one another.
description.es-la: Una conmovedora historia de dos chicas, diferente una de la otra, que se conocen por un encuentro con un gato y desde entonces han estado acompañándose y consolándose .

description.en:
'Sonidor', a dream artisan who enters into other people's dreams through physical contact and grants wishes that could not be fulfilled in reality. One day, the emperor suddenly arrives at the house and asks to wake up the crown prince who has fallen into eternal sleep. "I want you to wake him up."

Sonidor enters the dream of 'Marmel', the crown prince who is praised by everyone for his gentle nature and beautiful appearance, but somehow Marmel's dream is gloomy and desolate. “You were just going to kill me?!” 

According to the taste of the prince who hates people, Sonidor turns into various animals and finds the reason why Marmel fell asleep one by one, and Marmel gradually opens his heart to Sonidor... "Your Highness, do you believe me?" Will Sonidor be able to wake Marmel from his eternal sleep?
description.pl: "Będę trzymać jego ręce, by obudzić go z wiecznego snu"  Sodinor, ekspert do spraw snów, ma umiejętność spełnienia marzeń nawet w świecie snów. Na rozkaz cesarza została wprowadzona do snu księcia Marmella, który nie mógł się obudzić.  Jednak w snach księcia, który znany jest ze swojej dobroci i łagodności, jest coś bardzo dziwnego. Jego kraina marzeń jest opuszona i bezbarwna.   Sonidor infiltrując sny Marmella pod postacią uroczego zwierzątka udaje się znaleźć powód jego długiego letargu...  Czy Marmell obudzi się w końcu z wiecznego snu?

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais: After the Rain

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten: After the Rain

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まり二人は少しずつ惹かれあっていく――。

title.en: After Transmigration, I Turned an Icy Chief to Become Tsundere

altTitles.en: After Transmigration, I Turned an Icy Grand Assistant to Become Tsundere
After Transmigration, I Turned an Icy Grand Secretariat to Become Tsundere

altTitles.zh: 穿书后我把高冷首辅变傲娇了

description.en: Accidentally dressed as a woman and disguised as a man as a grandson, do you have to recharge to continue life? The bound power bank is still a deadly enemy! Such a wonderful setting is really unacceptable, but in order to survive, I can only force it!

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.es-la: ¡Fuyuki es una hermosa y atractiva gal! ¿Pero hay una parte de ella que solo le muestra a su esposo y mantiene en secreto del resto? Una linda comedia romántica con una esposa que es una gal.
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

description.en: After countless years, the Heavenly Demon, sealed within Mount Tai, finally awakened, only to discover that humanity had long abandoned the radiation-soaked Earth and was now exploring the far reaches of the galaxy.

altTitles.ja: ギミック！

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

altTitles.ja: どくどく

description.en: Freshman-year literature university student Yoshida moves into his new apartment next to an arts student from the same school. In his desire to start his life anew, what might a chance encounter with them bring?
description.fr: Yoshida, un étudiant en première année de littérature à l'université, emménage dans son nouvel appartement à côté d'une étudiante en arts de la même école. Dans son désir de recommencer sa vie, qu'est-ce qu'une rencontre fortuite avec eux pourrait apporter ?
description.es-la: Yoshida, estudiante universitario de primer año de literatura, se muda a su nuevo apartamento al lado de una estudiante de artes de la misma universidad. En su deseo de empezar de nuevo su vida, ¿qué le depararía un encuentro casual con ellos?

title.en: The Villainess Captured the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Capturé el corazón del gran duque siendo una villana

description.en:
In this novel, my favorite character died.
After being rejected by the female lead and losing his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities,
and as he became weak, the North collapsed.
Even his body was never to be found,
but the novel only depicted the happy ending of the protagonists.

And I possessed the body of the villainess "Schuer" from that novel.

"Rather, I'll make him regain his emotions before he meets the female lead."

Thus, I left for the North.

"Grand Duke, can you hold my hand just once?
Or maybe a signature. I'll keep it as a heirloom."
"If you want my signature, you too should sign and stamp here, my Lady."
"What's this?"
"A marriage certificate."

Huh?

"You can just act you usually do.
It seems like your behavior is
is somewhat getting on my nerves."

...Did I win the jackpot?

altTitles.ja: 追放する側の物語
追放する側の物語 仲間を追放したらパーティーが弱体化したけど、世界一を目指します。

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Banisher Side After Banishing The Party Member - The Party Was Weakened, But We Aim To Be The Best In The World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Suru Gawa no Monogatari - Nakama wo Tsuihou Shitara Party ga Jakutaika Shitakedo, Sekaiichi wo Mezashimasu.

description.en:
"Exile" and you're weakened!? A "do-over" fantasy of a failed party!
"Stardust", an up-and-coming party, in order to aim even higher, expels Est, a “burden” of the party members.
But as a result, the party is weakened and Est is awakened!

In this "Serves You Right!" situation, a swordsman with zero motivation and zero pride rises to the occasion!
This is a story about the "Aftermath" of the "Side that Banished Him".

The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
description.zh: 队内关系最差的两人，竟因为饭拍视频霸榜热搜！年下小狼狗x清冷禁欲哥哥，CP粉直呼嗑到了！明明出道就不合，却被迫开启漫漫虚假营业路~

description.ru: Эта история о маленьком песце, который сунул свой любопытный носик туда куда не нужно было. И оказавшись запертым на космическом корабле песец...

altTitles.ja: 小さな紳士🐭
小さな紳士とサーナイト
Shall we dance??

description.en:
**Additional Links:**
- [Ch. 1 Alt Official Raw (pixiv)](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/92362634)
- [Ch. 2 Official Raw (pixiv)](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/97332683)

altTitles.ja: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

title.en: Together With the Gods of Music

description.en:
A producer who had no talent but wanted to make it as a singer.
Death came on what he thought was his last chance, but the music gods didn't turn their backs on him.

-If the music gods don't abandon you, can you really do it?

With the gods of music, change began.
description.ko:
재능은 없지만 가수로 성공하고 싶었던 프로듀서.
마지막 기회라고 생각했던 날 찾아온 죽음, 그러나 음악의 신들은 그를 외면하지 않았다.

-음악의 신들이 너를 버리지 않는다면, 정말 할 수 있겠나?

음악의 신들과 함께 변화는 시작되었다.

title.en: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru ~ Bannou Cheat Skill wo Getto Shite, Mezase Rakuraku Saikyou Slow Life!~

altTitles.ja: ハズレスキル『ガチャ』で追放された俺は、わがまま幼馴染を絶縁し覚醒する ～万能チートスキルをゲットして、目指せ楽々最強スローライフ！～

altTitles.en: After Being Banished For Having The Trash Skill "Gacha", I Came To My Senses And Broke Off Relations With My Selfish Childhood Friend

description.en: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

altTitles.ja: ムシバミヒメ

description.en: In Toshiya Higashimoto's latest work Ai Tanaka, college student who wants to be a novelist, decides to share a room with Miu Yamaguchi who she met on the internet. Keep an your eyes on the roommates in this psychological horror.
description.ja: 【『テセウスの船』東元俊哉最新作！】小説家志望の大学生・田中愛は、募集サイトで知り合った山口美羽とルームシェアすることにしたのだが――。目が離せない、同居人サイコホラー。

description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.
